title: Linux tftp Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the tftp command in Linux, learn how to configure a tftp server, and practice transferring files using the tftp client. Gain practical networking skills through hands-on examples.

meta.title: Linux tftp Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the tftp command in Linux, learn how to configure a tftp server, and practice transferring files using the tftp client. Gain practical networking skills through hands-on examples.
meta.keywords: tftp, Linux, networking, file transfer, server configuration
